column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: ------Authorities raided a dump site on the morning of September 18
column5: at 9 am.------The Anti-Narcotics Committee of Khan Meanchey
column6: led the district-level security team from Social Affairs
column7: district police and gendarmerie to crack down on drug distribution on the dumping ground in Stung Meanchey commune
column9: Phnom Penh.------The swoop was done from 4 directions at the same time to prevent suspects from escaping.------As a result 25 suspected drug dealers and 6 drug users were detained.------21 packs of drugs
column10: including 2 large packages were seized and 5 shacks were dismantled and one burned down. ------POST NEWS
